title: Backend Developer
description: Developed backend services to scale for web and mobile environments. Collaborated with frontend developers to integrate backend services into the frontend. Designed and developed database schema for the backend services. Implemented CI/CD pipelines to automate the deployment process and handled the deployment of the backend services.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Designed and developed web system that streamlines inventory management process for internal employees. Collaborated with other engineers on existing internal systems to add new features and fix bugs.
